meanings.definition: The process of becoming latent or hidden.
meanings.sent1: The latensification of the treasure map made it difficult to find the hidden location.
meanings.sent2: The latensification of her emotions made it hard for others to understand how she truly felt.
meanings.sent3: The latensification of the surprise party location was so good that even the birthday girl couldn't find it!
meanings.sent4: The latensification of the truth was like a veil over reality, obscuring what lay beneath.
meanings.sent5: The latensification of the secret ingredient in the recipe added an air of mystery to the dish.

meanings.definition: The act of making something latent or hidden.
meanings.sent1: His latensification of the evidence raised suspicions about his true intentions.
meanings.sent2: The latensification of the key made it nearly impossible for anyone to unlock the hidden door.
meanings.sent3: The latensification of the surprise gift was so good that even the recipient couldn't guess what it was.
meanings.sent4: Her latensification of her feelings was like burying them deep underground, away from prying eyes.
meanings.sent5: The latensification of the truth in the story added layers of intrigue to the plot.

meanings.definition: The state of being latent or hidden.
meanings.sent1: The latensification of the spy's identity kept his true intentions shrouded in mystery.
meanings.sent2: The latensification of the virus made it difficult for scientists to detect its presence.
meanings.sent3: The latensification of the surprise party location was so good that even the birthday girl couldn't find it!
meanings.sent4: The latensification of the truth was like a veil over reality, obscuring what lay beneath.
meanings.sent5: The latensification of the secret ingredient in the recipe added an air of mystery to the dish.
